name: Angela's Room
description:
Tile-matching mini-mini. Easy. Kid-friendly. :)

This is a very simple game with only one stage (we simply ran out of free-time but still wanted to submit something). Fortunately some major bugs were solved but combos don't work yet (so you'll have to manually select the normally-points-giving-tiles to get more points). Oh, and the sound is still broken. (It's off by default.)

Controls: mouse; you can also use the R button for Retry
